channel.title: Can some one look at this code for me?
channel.description:
ok im adding a shop and heres what my spawn is
[code]spawn = 538 3252 3435 0 0 0 0 0 1 Barrows salesmen[/code]
Here is what my shop is [code]shop = 8 @blu@Barrows shop 2 2 4716 1000 4718 1000 4720 1000 4722 1000 4753 1000 4755 1000 4757 1000 4759 1000 4745 1000 4747 1000 4749 1000 4751 1000[/code] Here is my this in client.java
[code] } if (NPCID == 538) { //Barrows shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 8;[/code] Can anyone spot what i did wrong because when we go to trade him he dont trade. im trying to put pic on now
